text: Slaughter on Tenth Avenue is a 1957 American crime drama movie directed by Arnold Laven and starring Richard Egan, Jan Sterling, Dan Duryea, Julie Adams, Walter Matthau, Charles McGraw, Mickey Shaughnessy. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Arnold Laven Category:1957 crime drama movies
title: Slaughter on Tenth Avenue
